note.p: Birth: Golden Square, London, England (17 May 1758)
Death: Lime Grove, Putney, London (10 August 1839)
Burial Place: Family vault in Crowan parish church, Cornwall
Career: Succeeded to the Barontecy (1772); Sheriff of Cornwall (1781-1782); MP for Truro (1784); MP for Penrhyn (1784-1790); MP for Helston (1807-1812)
Authority: Altname St Aubyn from DNB
Notes: Charles Rainsford and J Lloyd both signed certificate twice, one of Lloyd's signatures has been crossed out
